QuestData.Title: Preservation
QuestData.Description: Oh no! We must stop them! $n, is it? The Order needs your help!$B$BDo you know what those horrible Slitherscale saurok are doing?$B$BThey have the audacity to steal cloud serpent eggs straight from the matriarch's nests!$B$BWhile the cloud serpents become ever rarer, those brutes are... are...$B$B<Suchi takes a deep breath.>$B$B...they're eat their eggs for dinner! It's horrible!$B$BGo to Windward Isle to the northeast and recover any unbroken eggs that you can. As students of the Order, it's our duty!
